review: I have been super happy with my Amazon Fire TV stick. I had previously owned chromecast and was always annoyed at needing to use my phone or computer to control it. The Amazon interface is super easy and could pretty much replace "On demand" for most people. Not only do you get access to free prime content, but also you can buy and watch movies easily on your TV
